alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Wood, northern Portage and southern Marathon Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 818 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Bevent to 12 miles northeast of Marshfield to 6 miles southwest of Colby. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bevent around 840 PM CDT. Marshfield around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Milladore, Big Eau Pleine County Park, Elderon, Pike Lake, Moon, Auburndale, March Rapids, North Star, Hewitt and Blenker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
